item.title: Lil' Packages Pt.1: tidyRSS
item.description: A couple of months ago, I got quite into making R packages. Well, I got specifically into making little R packages - that is, packages that basically do one thing, or are some type of wrapper for importing data from an API into R. I like these little packages. First of all, I think it’s great when you don’t have to trawl around the internet looking for data, only to find out it’s .
